title: Would Labour Save Families Thousands? (with Jonathan Reynolds)
itunes:title: Would Labour Save Families Thousands? (with Jonathan Reynolds)
description:
Shadow chancellor John McDonnell claims a Labour government would save families more than £6,700 a year. Jonathan Reynolds, shadow economic secretary to the Treasury, joins Bloomberg Westminster's Roger Hearing and Sebastian Salek from the campaign trail to talk through the numbers. Plus, Bloomberg's Edward Evans and David Merritt have analysis of the campaign as polling day looms.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
